verses.text: How \w beautiful|strong="H3302"\w* are thy \w feet|strong="H6471"\w* with \w shoes|strong="H5275"\w*, O \w prince’s|strong="H5081"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*! the \w joints|strong="H2542"\w* of thy \w thighs|strong="H3409"\w* \add are\add* like \w jewels|strong="H2481"\w*, the \w work|strong="H4639"\w* of the \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* of a cunning \w workman|strong="H0542"\w*.

Thy \w navel|strong="H8326"\w* \add is like\add* a \w round|strong="H5469"\w* \w goblet|strong="H0101"\w*, \add which\add* \w wanteth|strong="H2637"\w* not \w liquor|strong="H4197"\w*: thy \w belly|strong="H0990"\w* \add is like\add* an \w heap|strong="H6194"\w* of \w wheat|strong="H2406"\w* set \w about|strong="H5473"\w* with \w lilies|strong="H7799"\w*.\f + \fr 7.2 \ft liquor: Heb. mixture\f*

Thy \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w breasts|strong="H7699"\w* \add are\add* like \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w young|strong="H6082"\w* \w roes|strong="H6646"\w* \add that are\add* \w twins|strong="H8380"\w*.

Thy \w neck|strong="H6677"\w* \add is\add* as a \w tower|strong="H4026"\w* of \w ivory|strong="H8127"\w*; thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \add like\add* the \w fishpools|strong="H1295"\w* in \w Heshbon|strong="H2809"\w*, by the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* of \w Bath-rabbim|strong="H1337"\w*: thy \w nose|strong="H0639"\w* \add is\add* as the \w tower|strong="H4026"\w* of \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w* which \w looketh|strong="H6822"\w* \w toward|strong="H6440"\w* \w Damascus|strong="H1834"\w*.

Thine \w head|strong="H7218"\w* upon thee \add is\add* like \w Carmel|strong="H3760"\w*, and the \w hair|strong="H1803"\w* of thine \w head|strong="H7218"\w* like \w purple|strong="H0713"\w*; the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \add is\add* \w held|strong="H0631"\w* in the \w galleries|strong="H7298"\w*.\f + \fr 7.5 \ft Carmel: or, crimson\f*\f + \fr 7.5 \ft held: Heb. bound\f*
How \w fair|strong="H3302"\w* and how \w pleasant|strong="H5276"\w* art thou, O \w love|strong="H0160"\w*, for \w delights|strong="H8588"\w*!
This thy \w stature|strong="H6967"\w* is \w like|strong="H1819"\w* to a palm \w tree|strong="H8558"\w*, and thy \w breasts|strong="H7699"\w* to \w clusters|strong="H0811"\w* \add of grapes\add*.

I \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I will go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to the palm \w tree|strong="H8558"\w*, I will take \w hold|strong="H0270"\w* of the \w boughs|strong="H5577"\w* thereof: now also thy \w breasts|strong="H7699"\w* shall be as \w clusters|strong="H0811"\w* of the \w vine|strong="H1612"\w*, and the \w smell|strong="H7381"\w* of thy \w nose|strong="H0639"\w* like \w apples|strong="H8598"\w*;

And the roof of thy \w mouth|strong="H2441"\w* like the \w best|strong="H2896"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* for my \w beloved|strong="H1730"\w*, that \w goeth|strong="H1980"\w* \add down\add* \w sweetly|strong="H4339"\w*, causing the \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* of those that are \w asleep|strong="H3463"\w* to \w speak|strong="H1680"\w*.\f + \fr 7.9 \ft sweetly: Heb. straightly\f*\f + \fr 7.9 \ft of those…: or, of the ancient\f*
¶ I \add am\add* my \w beloved’s|strong="H1730"\w*, and his \w desire|strong="H8669"\w* \add is\add* toward me.

\w Come|strong="H3212"\w*, my \w beloved|strong="H1730"\w*, let us go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* into the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*; let us \w lodge|strong="H3885"\w* in the \w villages|strong="H3723"\w*.

Let us get up \w early|strong="H7925"\w* to the \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w*; let us \w see|strong="H7200"\w* if the \w vine|strong="H1612"\w* \w flourish|strong="H6524"\w*, \add whether\add* the tender \w grape|strong="H5563"\w* \w appear|strong="H6605"\w*, \add and\add* the \w pomegranates|strong="H7416"\w* bud \w forth|strong="H5132"\w*: there will I \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee my \w loves|strong="H1730"\w*.\f + \fr 7.12 \ft appear: Heb. open\f*

The \w mandrakes|strong="H1736"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* a \w smell|strong="H7381"\w*, and at our \w gates|strong="H6607"\w* \add are\add* all manner of \w pleasant|strong="H4022"\w* \add fruits\add*, \w new|strong="H2319"\w* and \w old|strong="H3465"\w*, \add which\add* I have laid \w up|strong="H6845"\w* for thee, O my \w beloved|strong="H1730"\w*.
